stateExplanation.notSupportedBrowserInfo: Unfortunately, Web Bluetooth does not seem to be supported by your browser. Please make sure you are using a web browser that supports Bluetooth and Web Bluetooth is enabled. We recommend Google Chrome.
stateExplanation.notSupportedDeviceInfo: If you are still having problems, consider using another Bluetooth-capable device - if necessary, with another operating system.
